title: Career Ladder ðŸ§—
description: Climbing the career ladder is about strategic growth, continuous learning, and making yourself valuable to your organization. It involves promotions, skill development, and taking on more responsibility.
sentences: Excel in your current role before looking for the next one.
Seek feedback regularly and work on your areas of improvement.
Find a mentor who can guide you in your career.
Proactively take on new challenges and responsibilities.
Develop both hard skills (technical) and soft skills (communication, leadership).
dos: Communicate your career aspirations to your manager.
Build strong relationships with colleagues and stakeholders.
Become a subject matter expert in your field.
donts: Don't wait to be told what to do; be proactive.
Don't burn bridges when you leave a role.
Don't stop learning once you get a promotion.
